languages.text: "Убей для меня. Спустись в Увечный сектор, найди там выродка — твоего сородича, — который зовет себя Комиссаром, и выпусти ему кишки. За это ты получишь мое расположение. А в Прорве оно значит многое".

"Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."
languages.original_text: "Убей для меня. Спустись в Увечный сектор, найди там выродка — твоего сородича, — который зовет себя Комиссаром, и выпусти ему кишки. За это ты получишь мое расположение. А в Прорве оно значит многое".

traits.locale_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “替我杀个人。去崩落区，找到一个叫‘政委’的混蛋。他是你的同类，你替我把他开膛破肚。只要办好这件事情，你就能赢得我的青睐，而我的青睐在裂隙中很重要。”
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."

traits.locale_text: “替我杀个人。去崩落区，找到一个叫‘政委’的混蛋。他是你的同类，你替我把他开膛破肚。只要办好这件事情，你就能赢得我的青睐，而我的青睐在裂隙中很重要。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Quiero que mates por mí. Ve al Sector Destrozado y encuentra a un espantajo que se hace llamar el Comisario. Es de tu propia especie. Destrípalo por mí y te habrás ganado mi favor. Aquí, en el Abismo, eso cuenta para mucho».
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero que mates por mí. Ve al Sector Destrozado y encuentra a un espantajo que se hace llamar el Comisario. Es de tu propia especie. Destrípalo por mí y te habrás ganado mi favor. Aquí, en el Abismo, eso cuenta para mucho».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「ある人物を殺してくれ。切り裂かれた星域に行き、コミッサーという狂人を探せ。貴様と同じ人間だ。そいつのはらわたを引きずりだして始末しろ。そしたら借りを返したとみなそう。この裂け目にいるなら、俺の信頼を得たほうが無難だ」
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."

traits.locale_text: 「ある人物を殺してくれ。切り裂かれた星域に行き、コミッサーという狂人を探せ。貴様と同じ人間だ。そいつのはらわたを引きずりだして始末しろ。そしたら借りを返したとみなそう。この裂け目にいるなら、俺の信頼を得たほうが無難だ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Tötet für mich. Geht in den Zerfleischten Sektor und findet einen aus Eurem Volk, einen Freak, der sich der Kommissar nennt. Schneidet ihm die Eingeweide heraus. Wenn Ihr das tut, gewinnt Ihr meine Gunst. Und in der Kluft ist das viel wert."
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."

traits.locale_text: "Tötet für mich. Geht in den Zerfleischten Sektor und findet einen aus Eurem Volk, einen Freak, der sich der Kommissar nennt. Schneidet ihm die Eingeweide heraus. Wenn Ihr das tut, gewinnt Ihr meine Gunst. Und in der Kluft ist das viel wert."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Que vous tuiez pour moi. Rendez-vous dans le Secteur condamné, trouvez un humain qui se fait appeler le commissaire et éventrez-le pour moi. Ensuite, vous aurez mérité ma faveur... ce qui, dans l'Abîme, compte pour beaucoup. »
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."

traits.locale_text: « Que vous tuiez pour moi. Rendez-vous dans le Secteur condamné, trouvez un humain qui se fait appeler le commissaire et éventrez-le pour moi. Ensuite, vous aurez mérité ma faveur... ce qui, dans la Faille, compte pour beaucoup. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Benim için öldürmeni. Biçimsiz Sektör'e gidip Komiser dedikleri ucubeyi bulacaksın. O da senin gibi bir insancık. Bu insancığın karnını deşeceksin. Böylece minnetimi kazanmış olacaksın. Yarık'ta daha iyisini zor bulursun."
languages.original_text: "Kill for me. Go into the Mangled Sector and find a freak called the Commissar — one of your kind — and spill his guts for me. Do that and you will earn my favour. And in the Chasm, that counts for a lot."
